item.title: 6 Ways Twisters Sets Up A Sequel
item.description: Twisters is a hit, so the studio might not wait 28 years for another sequel â€“ and the movie has plenty of interesting setups for more stories.

item.title: Rey's No Kenobi, But This Popular Star Wars Theory Means Obi-Wan's Family Line May Not Be Over
item.description: Although the Star Wars sequel trilogy did not confirm the fan theory that Rey is a Kenobi, another descendant of Obi-Wan could still be revealed.

item.title: This Disney Princess Has The Biggest Age Gap With Their Love Interest
item.description: Many Disney princesses are the same age, while the Princes' ages vary. This can lead to some large age gaps, with one huge Disney age gap romance
